summary: This is an email chain from October 15, 2020, regarding the review and approval of search queries in the 'US v. Epstein' database and a related 'US v. Epstein (SW)' database. The correspondence involves procedural steps for handling materials, including designating them as confidential or highly confidential.

events.title: Database Search Review Correspondence
events.description: Email correspondence regarding the review and approval of specific search queries in the 'US v. Epstein' and 'US v. Epstein (SW)' databases, including designations for confidentiality.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated October 15, 2020, concerning the legal case 'US v. Epstein'.
It references searches within a 'US v. Epstein' database and a separate 'US v. Epstein (SW)' database.
The searches involve designating materials as 'Confidential' or 'Highly Confidential'.
The correspondence is procedural, focusing on the review and approval of database search queries.
The document identifier is EFTA00087022, and it is part of Data Set 9 from the released documents.
